result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.orig: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.html: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ beirt ḟear fiċe bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: Leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: The man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ga: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.orig: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.html: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anochtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá braon ar bord ag an ḟear anoċtThe man has a drink taken tonight.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.orig: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
result.ponchtml: Naċ raiḃ go leor den ḟear annWasn't he man enough?
